meanings.definition: To make something more modern or up to date.
meanings.sent1: I am updating my phone to the latest software version.
meanings.sent2: She is updating her wardrobe with new clothes for the season.
meanings.sent3: The computer kept updating itself, like a never-ending cycle of change.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were constantly updating, evolving like a living organism.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was updating before my eyes, with new buildings rising up.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something up to date.
meanings.sent1: The updating of the website was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: He was responsible for the regular updating of the company's records.
meanings.sent3: The updating of the old painting gave it a fresh new look.
meanings.sent4: The updating of the map revealed new roads and shortcuts.
meanings.sent5: The updating of the software improved its performance significantly.
